amendment.description: Amendment sought to add $719 million to the Missile Defense Agency's Budget.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 110-666 to add $719 million to the Missile Defense Agency's Budget.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 229 (Roll no. 356).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 229 (Roll no. 356).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Franks (AZ).
